channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [SPARK-11134] Flaky test: o.a.s.launcher.LauncherBackendSuite
item.description:
sbt.ForkMain$ForkError: The code passed to eventually never returned normally. Attempted 110 times over 10.042591494 seconds. Last failure message: The reference was null.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
User 'vanzin' has created a pull request for this issue:
https://github.com/apache/spark/pull/9235

I'm currently experiencing similar issues with the current state of branch-1.6. Should I open a new JIRA?

Below is the error I'm seeing in the test report:

No, at best reopen this one, but maybe wait for a comment.
Let me try on the current branch-1.6 to see if anything obvious comes up.

tmagrino all looks good here. If you could run the test in isolation and upload the logs it might help.

  • rm core/target/unit-tests.log
  • inside sbt: testOnly *.LauncherBackendSuite
